subject: Delivery tracking
description_text:
Hello, I placed an order for some pedals (Order ID: #SSN6016) and was wondering if I will receive a tracking number at some point?

I’m just really excited to get your pedals and don’t wanna be in the dark about when they will come. I haven’t received any info regarding the delivery status so that’s why I’m asking.

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Trey Houle,  We apologize for the inconvenience. The Pro X pedals are currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We have urgently arranged an air shipment and expect to ship your order on the 22nd, with delivery estimated around the 25th.

Okay thank you for letting me know. Can you cancel my order and issue a
refund? I found a good deal on pedals near me and don’t really want to wait.

On Sat, Jan 17, 2026 at 2:23 AM service@simsonn.com
Our US warehouse has received the shipment. Do you still need to cancel?

Yes… I feel bad that you shipped it here but I’m sure someone else will
purchase it.

On Tue, Jan 20, 2026 at 12:36 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Trey Houle,    Alright, we'll cancel your order for you.
